title: Marvo Scorpion CH-106 Adjustable Gaming Chair Black
cat_seo_title: Marvo Gaming Chair Price in Bangladesh
cat_seo_description: Buy Marvo Gaming Chair at best price in Bangladesh. Marvo Gaming Chair will give you a comfortable Gaming experience. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech shop.
full_description:
Marvo Scorpion CH-106 Adjustable Gaming Chair Black

This Marvo CH106 Gaming Chair comes in Black color. The Black color gives it a very premium look and the material quality is very good that meets the looks properly. It features Stable and Sturdy nylon Base, Pu Caster Wheels, Butterfly, Adjusting Mechanism; 360 Degree Rotation, Full Backwards Backrest Swivel for a Flat Position Camber Pvc Armrest, Detachable Head and Lower Back Pillows, and Full Synthetic Leather Finish. This gaming chair has a 100 mm gas lift system and 350 mm nylon base arms. Here used PU, PVC materials. This Gaming Chair is featured with Backrest width: 57 cm, Armrest height: 34 cm, Seat width: 53 cm, Backrest height: 85 cm, Seat depth: 50 cm, Seat adjustable height: 44 - 54 cm, Chair height: 129 - 139 cm and has the maximum load capacity of150 kg. The Marvo Scorpion CH-106 Adjustable Gaming Chair Black has no warranty.

values.value: Detachable Head and Lower Back Pillows
